author: Jitendra Soni
title: Beware - this 'virus infection' email is sending you malware
description: Scam looks to scare users into downloading malware which can steal personal details.
content:
While the world grapples with the coronavirus pandemic, hackers are reportedly using infection-related emails as a hook for a new phishing campaign.
A coronavirus-themed attack is looking to steal personal information from victims, including cryptocurrency w… [+1722 chars]
